Cloud Storage¶

bibtutils.gcp.storage¶

Functionality making use of GCP’s Cloud Storage.

bibtutils.gcp.storage.read_gcs(bucket_name, blob_name, decode=True)[source]¶

Reads the contents of a blob from GCS. Service account must have (at least) read permissions on the bucket/blob.

Parameters

  • bucket_name (str) – the bucket hosting the specified blob.

  • blob_name (str) – the blob to read from GCS.

  • decode (bool) – (Optional) whether or not to decode the blob contents into utf-8. Defaults to True.

Return type

str

Returns

blob contents, decoded to utf-8.

bibtutils.gcp.storage.read_gcs_nldjson(bucket_name, blob_name)[source]¶

Reads a blob in JSON NLD format from GCS and returns it as a dict.

Parameters

  • bucket_name (str) – the bucket hosting the specified blob.

  • blob_name (str) – the blob to read from GCS.

Return type

dict

Returns

the data from the blob, converted into a dict object.

bibtutils.gcp.storage.write_gcs(bucket_name, blob_name, data)[source]¶

Writes a String to GCS storage under a given blob name to the given bucket. The executing account must have (at least) write permissions to the bucket.

Parameters

  • bucket_name (str) – the name of the bucket to which to write.

  • blob_name (str) – the name of the blob to write.

  • data (str) – the data to be written.

bibtutils.gcp.storage.write_gcs_nldjson(bucket_name, blob_name, json_data, add_date=False)[source]¶

Writes a dict to GCS storage under a given blob name to the given bucket. The executing account must have (at least) write permissions to the bucket.

Parameters

  • bucket_name (str) – the name of the bucket to which to write.

  • blob_name (str) – the name of the blob to write.

  • json_data (dict) – the data to be written. will be converted to JSON NLD before uploading for compatibility with BQ.

  • add_date (bool) – (Optional) whether or not to add upload date to the data before upload. Defaults to False.
